QuestData.Title: Felfire Shattering
QuestData.Description:
A thin series of stone bridges connects the Burning Breach to Felfire Armory over Fiend's Run. The Army of the Light will stem Legion reinforcements while your people deal with the armory itself.
Work swiftly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scouting Map and complete the mission, "Assault on Felfire Armory."

Objectives.Objective: Complete the mission, "Assault on Felfire Armory."
